title: Two's Company
description: Judged by Guest Judge Jesse Thorn, and bailiffed by Jordan Morris! Margaret files suit against her male housemate and best friend, who's lied to his family about living with a woman. She wants him to come clean!
author: shows@maximumfun.org (Jesse Thorn)
